mapper.select: SELECT stock_code AS stockCode, name AS name, model AS model, maker AS maker, stock_type AS stockType, rent_flag AS rentFlag, ownership_Type AS ownershipType, lease_return_date AS leaseReturnDate, remarks AS remarks FROM stock_master WHERE stock_code = #{serialNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE stock_master SET name = #{name}, model = #{model}, maker = #{maker}, stock_type = #{stockType}, rent_flag = #{rentFlag}, ownership_type = #{ownershipType}, lease_return_date = #{leaseReturnDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, del = #{del} WHERE stock_code = #{stockCode}
